welcome_message_body: Welcome to Devizes, a charming market town in the heart of the stunning Wiltshire countryside. Known for its rich history, picturesque canals, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is only available in designated areas and requires a password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Bristol Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
